entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
